Post-Match Reflections: Chet Holmgren suffered a right iliac wing fracture and is expected to return this season, with a return-to-play protocol in 8-10 weeks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chet Holmgren averaged 18.2 points, 9.2 rebounds and 2.9 blocks through nine games, the second-best mark in the NBA.
Isaiah Hartenstein, who's been sidelined with a fracture in his hand, is expected to return for OKC near the end of November.
Others: Chet Holmgren's injury will leave the Thunder without a center for the coming weeks.
